channel.title: Combat Xp (718/728)
channel.description:
Hello, i'm busy in my matrix 718/728 to make the xp rates of magic, ranged, attack, strenght, defence and hp to make the xp rates higher, so my economy will be almost complete.
But, in the wildy i want the old xp rates of combat, so pking stays fun.
How do i do this?
